abstract: Detective Gescard F Isnora, testifying in departmental trial, says that he thought a passenger in Sean Bell’s car was raising a gun toward him when he and four other officers opened fire, killing Bell and wounding two passengers in his car; departmental proceedings will determine whether Isnora will be allowed to keep his job.
snippet: At a Police Department trial, Detective Gescard Isnora said he thought a passenger in Sean Bell’s car was raising a gun toward him.
lead_paragraph: At a Police Department trial, Detective Gescard Isnora said he thought a passenger in Sean Bell’s car was raising a gun toward him.

headline.main: Detective Tells of Fatal Shots Fired at Car
headline.print_headline: Detective Tells Of Fatal Shots Fired at Car
headline.seo: Detective Tells of Decision to Fire at Sean Bell’s Car
